=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hidden Figures
Review Date: 2018/02/04
Store: Henson, Taraji P.  (Actor),     Monae, Janelle  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
Product Description: ["HIDDEN FIGURES is the incredible untold story of Katherine G. Johnson (Taraji P. Henson), Dorothy Vaughan (Octavia Spencer) and Mary Jackson (Janelle Monáe)-brilliant African-American women working at NASA, who served as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history: the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit, a stunning achievement that restored the nation's confidence, turned around the Space Race, and galvanized the world. The visionary trio crossed all gender and race lines to inspire generations to dream big."]
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Spencer, Octavia, Costner, Kevin, Dunst, Kirsten, Monae, Janelle, Henson, Taraji P.', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Surround)', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.5 x 5.3 x 6.7 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Release date': 'April 11, 2017', 'Actors': 'Henson, Taraji P., Monae, Janelle, Spencer, Octavia, Dunst, Kirsten, Costner, Kevin', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Didn't think I would like it, but it was very captivating and I saw it on HBO maybe 5 or 6 times and decided I had to have it in my collection. Havent opened it yet, waiting for the right time, but the story is great, and good to know some history on our race to space from a different perspective.

reference_summary:
The Soldier VHS
Ken Wahl  (Actor),     Alberta Watson  (Actor),     James Glickenhaus  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: VHS Tape
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, MGM Home Entertainment, MGM Movie Time
['New!!! VHS TAPE Sealed (as shown) "The Soldier [VHS]" Fast shipping..(DC-3)']
{'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'James Glickenhaus', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 6, 1999', 'Date First Available': 'September 29, 2006', 'Actors': 'Ken Wahl, Alberta Watson, Jeremiah Sullivan, William Prince, Klaus Kinski', 'Studio': 'Fox Home Entertainme'}
Back in the 80s when this was made, i think it was a pretty good flick, it has a weak plot though and some areas could have been expanded upon. But the idea of this movie is so original, I like the idea of our guys stealing one of our own nukes to threaten the Russians who stole some of our nuclear fuel to make a bomb and put it in the Saudi oil fields in an attempt to get the Israeli's off the west bank. It feels like a class B movie, but it is enjoyable all the same. This movie would make a great remake if done today, and considering some of the garbage that has been released lately, this one would be a big hit.
Great concept for storyline
High Road to China
Tom Selleck  (Actor),     Bess Armstrong  (Actor),     Brian G. Hutton  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
["Take the high road to adventure with Tom Selleck and Bess Armstrong in this freewheeling action-comedy set in the Roaring Twenties. Selleck stars as Patrick O'Malley, a boozing, washed-up aviator who meets his match when he's hired by a high-strung heiress to find her long lost father. They make their way eastward in O'Malley's WWI biplane, surviving narrow escapes, last second rescues, and combat with warlords along the way. But nothing tops the ongoing battle they have with each other - the one which leads inevitably to romance."]

Despicable Me 3 [Blu-ray]
Steve Carell  (Actor),     Kristen Wiig  (Actor),     Pierre Coffin  (Director),     Kyle Balda  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["Illumination, who brought moviegoers Despicable Me, Despicable Me 2, and the biggest animated hit of 2015, Minions, continues the story of Gru, Lucy, their adorable daughters—Margo, Edith and Agnes—and the Minions in Despicable Me 3. After he is fired from the Anti-Villain League for failing to take down Balthazar Bratt, the latest bad guy to threaten humanity, Gru finds himself in the midst of a major identity crisis. But when a mysterious stranger shows up to inform Gru that he has a long-lost twin brother—a brother who desperately wishes to follow in his twin's despicable footsteps—one former super-villain will rediscover just how good it feels to be bad."]

This Blu Ray is terrible, it didn't want to read until I retried 3 times, then about half way thru, it skipped/paused/went silent etc, then it just jumped to the bonus section after about 5 minutes of inoperation. Will be returning this one and going with a DVD version.
Bad Quality Blu-Ray

profile:
The user maintains a strong enthusiasm for movies, particularly from the 1980s and 1990s, with a focus on action and thriller genres. They prefer original storylines that prioritize creativity and innovation over technical execution, showcasing a fondness for nostalgic and cult classic films. Recently, they engaged with contemporary animated cinema, yet highlighted issues with playback quality on Blu-ray, leading them to revert to DVDs for reliability. 

Their thoughtful engagement with cinema is marked by a critical but positive perspective; they celebrate beloved films while recognizing their shortcomings, emphasizing meaningful narratives and emotional connections. Notably, they have shown an openness to remakes of older films, reflecting a belief in the value of contemporary interpretations.

The recent interaction reveals a willingness to explore diverse genres, demonstrated by a captivating viewing experience that exceeded initial expectations and inspired the user to add the film to their collection despite not having opened it yet. This reinforces their commitment to quality and the importance of historical narratives, showcasing an appreciation for different perspectives in storytelling. Overall, the user exemplifies a balance between a deep-seated love for thematic creativity in cinema and a discerning attitude towards the quality and context of the media they consume.
